# OnlinerBaseType&lt;T&gt;.InstanceMaxValue property

Gets the maximum value allowed for this tag. The default max. value is maximum of this type if [`AttributeMaximum`](./AttributeMaximum.md) is not set. If the [`AttributeMaximum`](./AttributeMaximum.md) property is set then `InstanceMaxValue` will return its value.

```csharp
public abstract T InstanceMaxValue { get; }
```
